drinks.name: Sunset Flower
drinks.description: Green milk tea that made with our in house homebrew tea. Organic milk from Pitton-Milk with the topping of our own rainbow jelly.

drinks.name: Rainy Rosse
drinks.description: Rose tea blended with pineaple citrus, mountain mongo. A refreshing iced tea topped with sliced coconut and pineaple.

drinks.name: Hawailian Peach
drinks.description: Peach Strawberry munble tea topped with our special lychee jelly. A tropical tea for your sweet tooth.

drinks.name: India Chai Lover
drinks.description: A special drink blended in India!!! A bitter, mellow citrus sweet hinted of chai tea toppped with shedded orange and rainbow jelly.

drinks.name: White Coconut
drinks.description: Coconut citrus tea. A tropical mixed with jelly and real coconut. Recommended by less sweet or maximum sweet to satisfy your sweet tooth.

drinks.name: Passion Sweet Tooth
drinks.description: One of the most colorful drink blended with strawberry, orange, passion fruit topped with high quality fuits of your choice. Recommended less sweet.

drinks.name: Lavender Lover
drinks.description: The tittle said it all... A refreshing tea with lavender note topped with lavender flower.

drinks.name: Vietnamee Decaf
drinks.description: A very strong coffee that satisfy your caffeine kick.
